p: The GC–MS analysis was performed on Shimadzu GCMS-QP 2010 (Kyoto, Japan) equipped with an Rtx-5MS capillary column (30 m × 0.25 mm i.d. × 0.25 µm film thickness) (Restek, Bellefonte, PA, USA) according to the reported procedure [ 37]. The oven temperature was kept at 50 °C for 3 min (isothermal) and programmed to 300 °C at 5 °C/min, and then it was kept constant at 300 °C for 10 min (isothermal); the injector temperature was 280 °C. The helium was used as a carrier gas with a constant flow rate set at 1.37 mL/min. Diluted samples (1% v/ v) were injected with a split ratio of 15:1, and the injected volume was one μL. The MS operating parameters were as follows: interface temperature: 280 °C; ion source temperature: 220 °C; and EI mode: 70 eV; and scan range: 35–500 amu.
